io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.ed25519

Class AESGCM

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.ed25519.AESGCM

  • public class AESGCM
extends java.lang.Object
    AES/GSM/NoPadding encryption and decryption methods. Uses the BouncyCastle.org provider.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AUTH_TAG_BIT_LENGTH
      The standard authentication tag length (128 bits).
      static int IV_BIT_LENGTH
      The standard Initialisation Vector (IV) length (96 bits).
      static int IV_LENGTH
      The standard Initialisation Vector (IV) length (12 bytes).
      static int TAG_LENGTH
      The standard authentication tag length (16 bytes).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] decrypt(byte[] secretKey, byte[] iv, byte[] cipherText, byte[] authTag)
      Decrypts the specified cipher text using AES/GCM/NoPadding.
      static io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.ed25519.AuthenticatedCipherText encrypt(byte[] secretKey, byte[] iv, byte[] plainText)
      Encrypts the specified plain text using AES/GCM/NoPadding.
      static byte[] generateIV()
      Generates a random 96 bit (12 byte) Initialisation Vector(IV) for use in AES-GCM encryption.

    • Method Detail

      • generateIV

        public static byte[] generateIV()
        Generates a random 96 bit (12 byte) Initialisation Vector(IV) for use in AES-GCM encryption.

        See draft-ietf-jose-json-web-algorithms-08, section-4.9.

        Returns:
        The random 96 bit IV, as 12 byte array.

      • encrypt

        public static io.nem.symbol.core.crypto.ed25519.AuthenticatedCipherText encrypt(byte[] secretKey,
                                                                                byte[] iv,
                                                                                byte[] plainText)
                                                                         throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Encrypts the specified plain text using AES/GCM/NoPadding.
        Parameters:
        secretKey - The AES key. Must not be null.
        plainText - The plain text. Must not be null.
        iv - The initialisation vector (IV). Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The authenticated cipher text.
        Throws:
        CryptoException - If encryption failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(byte[] secretKey,
                             byte[] iv,
                             byte[] cipherText,
                             byte[] authTag)
                      throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Decrypts the specified cipher text using AES/GCM/NoPadding.
        Parameters:
        secretKey - The AES key. Must not be null.
        iv - The initialisation vector (IV). Must not be null.
        cipherText - The cipher text. Must not be null.
        authTag - The authentication tag. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The decrypted plain text.
        Throws:
        CryptoException - If decryption failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException
